title: Oxdrove Way Walking and Cycle Route
description: The Oxdrove Way is an off road cycle trail and walking path which forms a figure of eight through the rolling downland, woods and farmland of the Hampshire countryside around New Arlesford. You will pass Preston Down, Bradley, Upper Wield, New Alresford, Abbotstone and Itchen Down.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: The Three Castles Path is coincident with the trail near Winchester. This historically themed long distance trail will take you from Windsor Castle to Winchester Castle, visiting the ruined Odiham Castle on the way.

display_address: Spybush Lane, Itchen Stoke and Ovington, Winchester, Hampshire, England, SO24 9UD, United Kingdom
